scripts.all: npm run update-oomd && npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.test: tsc --build --clean && tsc --build && concurrently "yarn run tsc-watch" "yarn run webpack-watch"
scripts.docs: typedoc --options typedoc-md.json && typedoc --options typedoc-html.json --gaID G-XHBQC2GFXJ && shx cp ./src/docs/logo.png ./docs/html/assets
scripts.postinstall: npm install typescript-json-schema -g && npm install shx -g
scripts.update-oomd: shx rm -r ./src/oomd/* && shx cp -r ../open-ordinal-metadata/src/* ./src/oomd/ && shx rm -r ./src/oomd/docs
